errors.ownerOnly: This command can only be used by the bot owner!
errors.nsfw: This command can only be used in a NSFW channel!

user.title: Missing Permissions
user.description: You are missing the following permissions: %%PERMS%%

bot.title: Missing Permissions
bot.description: I am missing the following permissions: %%PERMS%%

errors.cooldown: Please wait, you can re-use this command %%TIME%%.

premiumCooldown.instant: Please wait, you can re-use this command %%TIME%%. If the server has an active premium subscription, you would use this command instantly.
premiumCooldown.normal: Please wait, you can re-use this command %%TIME%%. If the server has an active premium subscription, you can re-use the command in %%PREMIUMTIME%%

errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred while executing this command.
errors.premiumOnly: This command is only available to premium users!

info.title: Hi, I'm %%BOTNAME%%! Need help?
info.description: You can see everything I can do by using the `%%PREFIX%%help` command.

fields.name: Invite Me
fields.value: You can add me to your server by clicking [here](https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=%%BOID%%}&scope=applications.commands%20bot&permissions=8).

fields.name: Support
fields.value: If you have questions, suggestions, or found a bug, please join the [%%BOTNAME%% Support Server](%%BOTSUPPORT%%).
